nodes.text: The ACP Repeater Gun was a blaster weapon produced by Arakyd Industries and sold for 1,000 credits. The weapon was called the Trandoshan Chopper to mercenaries and as the Nar Shaddaa Grinder to Gank Killers.
The ACP Repeater Gun was mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
